biotools.summary: Brewery uses a suite of ab initio predictors of 1D PSAs. Brewery uses multiple sources of evolutionary information to achieve state-of-the-art predictions of secondary structure, structural motifs, relative solvent accessibility and contact density.

bioschemas.name: Brewery
